page.title: 03EVENTS:LANGTON HERRING FETE
page.content: THE{LANGTON HERRING SUMMER FETE}IS HELD IN EVERY{JULY}IN THE BEAUTIFUL SETTING OF THE{MANOR HOUSE}BY KIND PERMISSION OF{MRS. SPARKS}. THIS IS A SPECIAL FUN DAY FOR ALL THE FAMILY, BOTH FOR LOCALS AND THE VISTORS TO THE AREA.STALLS OF {HANDICRAFT, GARDEN PRODUCE, HOME-MADE {JAMS,PRESERVES AND CAKES}ARE ATTRACTIVELY ARRANGED BENEATH THE SHADE OF THE FRUIT ORCHARD.ATTRACTIONS SUCH AS{DOG SHOWS, SHOOTING}AND{FANCY {DRESS}ADD TO THE FLAVOUR OF THE DAY. THE{FETE}IS OPENED BY THE{TOWN {CRIER}.CHILDREN FROM{CHICKERELL SCHOOL DEMONSTRATE TRADITIONAL{COUNTRY {DANCES,MORRIS}AND{SWORD DANCES}.THE LOCAL{MAJORETTE TROOP}ALSO PERFORM ON THIS OCCASION.
